    • Constructor Detail

      • Holding

        public Holding(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String nit,
               java.lang.String address,
               java.lang.String phone,
               java.lang.String assets,
               Date dateOfConstitution,
               java.lang.String amountOfEmployees,
               java.lang.String legalRepresentative,
               int floors)
        Description: The constructor of the class Holding.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Post: All attributes of the class are initialized.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the company.
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        address - The company's correspondence address.
        phone - The contact phone number of the company.
        assets - the value of the company's assets in pesos.
        dateOfConstitution - The date of constitution of the company.
        amountOfEmployees - The number of the company's employees.
        legalRepresentative - The name of the company's representative legal.
        floors - The number of floors of the company's building (it must be between 3 and 7).

    • Method Detail

      • addManufacturingCompany

        public java.lang.String addManufacturingCompany(java.lang.String name,
                                                java.lang.String nit,
                                                java.lang.String address,
                                                java.lang.String phone,
                                                java.lang.String assets,
                                                Date dateOfConstitution,
                                                java.lang.String type,
                                                java.lang.String amountOfEmployees,
                                                java.lang.String legalRepresentative,
                                                int floors)
        Description: This method allows adding a manufacturing company to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Post: The manufacturing company will be added to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the company.
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        address - The company's correspondence address.
        phone - The contact phone number of the company.
        assets - the value of the company's assets in pesos.
        dateOfConstitution - The date of constitution of the company.
        type - The type of organization (The types of organizations that exist are specified in the constant TYPE).
        amountOfEmployees - The number of the company's employees.
        legalRepresentative - The name of the company's representative legal.
        floors - The number of floors of the company's building (it must be between 3 and 7).
        Returns:
        A message that indicates to the user that the manufacturing company was added successfully.

      • addPharmaceuticalCompany

        public java.lang.String addPharmaceuticalCompany(java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.lang.String nit,
                                                 java.lang.String address,
                                                 java.lang.String phone,
                                                 java.lang.String assets,
                                                 Date dateOfConstitution,
                                                 java.lang.String type,
                                                 java.lang.String amountOfEmployees,
                                                 java.lang.String legalRepresentative,
                                                 int floors,
                                                 java.lang.String sanitaryRegistration,
                                                 boolean status,
                                                 java.lang.String modality,
                                                 Date expirationDate)
        Description: This method allows adding a pharmaceutical company to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Post: The pharmaceutical company will be added to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the company.
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        address - The company's correspondence address.
        phone - The contact phone number of the company.
        assets - the value of the company's assets in pesos.
        dateOfConstitution - The date of constitution of the company.
        type - The type of organization (The types of organizations that exist are specified in the constant TYPE).
        amountOfEmployees - The number of the company's employees.
        legalRepresentative - The name of the company's representative legal.
        floors - The number of floors of the company's building (it must be between 3 and 7).
        sanitaryRegistration - The sanitary registry given by INVIMA.
        status - The status (Valid = true and Not renewed = false ).
        modality - The modality of the company.
        expirationDate - The expiration date of the sanitary registration.
        Returns:
        A message that indicates to the user that the pharmaceutical company was added successfully.

      • addTechnologyCompany

        public java.lang.String addTechnologyCompany(java.lang.String name,
                                             java.lang.String nit,
                                             java.lang.String address,
                                             java.lang.String phone,
                                             java.lang.String assets,
                                             Date dateOfConstitution,
                                             java.lang.String type,
                                             java.lang.String amountOfEmployees,
                                             java.lang.String legalRepresentative,
                                             int floors,
                                             double energyConsumed,
                                             int service1,
                                             int service2,
                                             int service3,
                                             int service4,
                                             int service5,
                                             int service6)
        Description: This method allows adding a technology company to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Post: The technology company will be added to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the company.
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        address - The company's correspondence address.
        phone - The contact phone number of the company.
        assets - the value of the company's assets in pesos.
        dateOfConstitution - The date of constitution of the company.
        type - The type of organization (The types of organizations that exist are specified in the constant TYPE).
        amountOfEmployees - The number of the company's employees.
        legalRepresentative - The name of the company's representative legal.
        floors - The number of floors of the company's building (it must be between 3 and 7).
        energyConsumed - The energy consumed by the company in kilowatts.
        service1 - A number that indicates if the company has that service (0 if the company does not have that service and 1 if the company have that service).
        service2 - A number that indicates if the company has that service (0 if the company does not have that service and 1 if the company have that service).
        service3 - A number that indicates if the company has that service (0 if the company does not have that service and 1 if the company have that service).
        service4 - A number that indicates if the company has that service (0 if the company does not have that service and 1 if the company have that service).
        service5 - A number that indicates if the company has that service (0 if the company does not have that service and 1 if the company have that service).
        service6 - A number that indicates if the company has that service (0 if the company does not have that service and 1 if the company have that service).
        Returns:
        A message that indicates to the user that the technology company was added successfully.

      • addEducationalCompany

        public java.lang.String addEducationalCompany(java.lang.String name,
                                              java.lang.String nit,
                                              java.lang.String address,
                                              java.lang.String phone,
                                              java.lang.String assets,
                                              Date dateOfConstitution,
                                              java.lang.String type,
                                              java.lang.String amountOfEmployees,
                                              java.lang.String legalRepresentative,
                                              int floors,
                                              java.lang.String id,
                                              int accreditedYears,
                                              int nationalPositioningTest11Pro,
                                              java.lang.String rectorName,
                                              int educationalSector,
                                              int studentsOfLowStratus,
                                              int amountOfStudents)
        Description: This method allows adding a educational company to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Post: The educational company will be added to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the company.
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        address - The company's correspondence address.
        phone - The contact phone number of the company.
        assets - the value of the company's assets in pesos.
        dateOfConstitution - The date of constitution of the company.
        type - The type of organization (The types of organizations that exist are specified in the constant TYPE).
        amountOfEmployees - The number of the company's employees.
        legalRepresentative - The name of the company's representative legal.
        floors - The number of floors of the company's building (it must be between 3 and 7).
        id - The registration number of approval before the Ministry of National Education.
        accreditedYears - The number of years accredited as a high-quality entity.
        nationalPositioningTest11Pro - National position according to exams saber11/Pro.
        rectorName - The name of the rector.
        educationalSector - A number that indicates the education sector (0 if it is high school and 1 if it is a university).
        studentsOfLowStratus - The number of active students stratum 1 and 2.
        amountOfStudents - The total number of active students.
        Returns:
        A message that indicates to the user that the educational company was added successfully.

      • addPublicServicesCompany

        public java.lang.String addPublicServicesCompany(java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.lang.String nit,
                                                 java.lang.String address,
                                                 java.lang.String phone,
                                                 java.lang.String assets,
                                                 Date dateOfConstitution,
                                                 java.lang.String type,
                                                 java.lang.String amountOfEmployees,
                                                 java.lang.String legalRepresentative,
                                                 int floors,
                                                 java.lang.String service,
                                                 int amountOfSubscribers,
                                                 int subscribersOfStratum1And2)
        Description: This method allows adding a public services company to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Post: The public services company will be added to the holding's ArrayList of companies.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the company.
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        address - The company's correspondence address.
        phone - The contact phone number of the company.
        assets - the value of the company's assets in pesos.
        dateOfConstitution - The date of constitution of the company.
        type - The type of organization (The types of organizations that exist are specified in the constant TYPE).
        amountOfEmployees - The number of the company's employees.
        legalRepresentative - The name of the company's representative legal.
        floors - The number of floors of the company's building (it must be between 3 and 7).
        service - The type of service provided by the company.
        amountOfSubscribers - The current number of total subscribers.
        subscribersOfStratum1And2 - The number of subscribers in stratum 1 and 2.
        Returns:
        A message that indicates to the user that the public services company was added successfully.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the employee.

      • addSurvey

        public java.lang.String addSurvey(int answer1,
                                  int answer2,
                                  int answer3,
                                  java.lang.String nit)
        Description: This method allows adding a survey to the ArrayList of surveys.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Post: The survey will be added to the ArrayList of surveys.
        Parameters:
        answer1 - A number that represents the answer to question 1(On a scale of 1 to 5 where 1 is not satisfied and 5 is very satisfied, how satisfied are you with: the questions are specified in the constant QUESTIONS).
        answer2 - A number that represents the answer to question 2(On a scale of 1 to 5 where 1 is not satisfied and 5 is very satisfied, how satisfied are you with: the questions are specified in the constant QUESTIONS).
        answer3 - A number that represents the answer to question 3(On a scale of 1 to 5 where 1 is not satisfied and 5 is very satisfied, how satisfied are you with: the questions are specified in the constant QUESTIONS).
        Returns:
        A message that tells the user if the survey has been successfully added or not.

      • calculateLevelOfSatisfaction

        public java.lang.String calculateLevelOfSatisfaction(java.lang.String nit)
        Description: This method allow calculate the company's satisfaction level (Use the nit to found the company).
        Pre: The nit cannot be null.
        Parameters:
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        Returns:
        A message that indicates if the company was found or not, if the company was found, will show the company's satisfaction level.

      • addProduct

        public java.lang.String addProduct(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String id,
                                   double waterRequired,
                                   int inventory,
                                   java.lang.String nit)
        Description: This method allows adding a product to the ArrayList of products.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the product.
        id - The id that identifies it
        waterRequired - The amount of water (liters) required for manufacturing.
        inventory - The number of units in the inventory.
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        Returns:
        A message that tells the user if the product has been successfully added or not.
